title: I Wish I Could Un-own Champs
body:
As an ARAM only player, I would love the option to delete champs that I have purchased but don't like to play.
All it does is cause me to dodge more, and play less.

I should be able to convert an owned champ into the BE the shard is worth, and the same with skins for that champ into OE.

Even just a delete function with no compensation would be fine.

I mean, I'm not trying to get an elite ARAM selection, I just don't want all 110+ (idk how many it actually is) champs I own as a selection for ARAM, when many do just play accounts that only own champs that are good in ARAM.

replies.body:
You can 'un-own' champs. Send a support ticket in requesting to have x champion(s) removed from you account.

I did this when I kept 'randomly' getting nunu in aram, and I'm just not a fan of nunu. You can get as many removed as you like, without compensation ofcourse.

> 
> I did this when I kept 'randomly' getting nunu in aram, and I'm just not a fan of nunu. You can get as many removed as you like, without compensation ofcourse.

Thanks, I'll give that a try.

Honestly, as an ARAM player, I think that all random-pick modes should have all champions on a permanent "free-to-play" status. Would completely solve the issue of ARAM accounts, and actually put everyone on equal footing when it comes to their chances of getting any given champ, as well as encourage diversity.
